entry.title: [CW] The magistrate who approved the warrant seems to be corrupt. Here is a timeline
entry.content:
The magistrate who approved the warrant seems to be corrupt. Here is a timeline of his involvement with the Epstein case:
- Reinhart was working for the justice department - 10/07 Reinhart registers a llc registered in Epstein’s defense lawyers name(not sure if it was registered like this from the beginning or switched later) - during the middle of the case Reinhart switches sides, quits the DOJ and immediately starts represents Epstein’s employees. The llc is used for his defense firm - 2011 Reinhart denies he was involved in the case while at the DOJ during a lawsuit - 2013 supervisors of reinhart contradict him and say he was privy to private info about the case.
Am I missing something here, because it seems like he was in contact about a job with Epstein’s side while the DOJ was prosecuting Epstein and he was privy to private info about the case. Seems like straightforward corruption
